column4: Excuse me, I've got this laptop here, and I want to make sure nothing bad will happen if I install Ubuntu on it...
Exactly, I want to make sure I'm clever enough. What are some concerns with installing ubuntu on notebooks?
mostly wireless issues... maybe video issues, since most lappys seem to use ATI..
I have Xubuntu 6.10 on a fairly old Compaq Laptop, seems to work fine
